We are excited to share that we have received the [R&D100 award](https://www.rdworldonline.com/2023-rd-100-award-winners/){target="_blank"} for our [Materials Learning Algorithms](https://github.com/mala-project){target="_blank"} package. Congratulations to the team and our collaborators!

Read more about this in this [press release](https://www.hzdr.de/db/Cms?pOid=70759&pNid=3438){target="_blank"}.
